title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, tools, and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI with interactive REPL and model management commands.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Multi-arch Docker Compose stack for Ollama + CUDA + WebUI.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that chats with Ollama models and supports group conversations.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from the OpenAPI spec.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama and common models with CUDA support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Llama-3, Phi-3, Mistral, etc.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot slash-command integration for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI landing page for the official ollama Python package.
